## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer">LinkGraphLinkingLayer</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer">LinkGraphLinkingLayer</a> links LinkGraphs into the Executor using JITLink. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin">Plugin</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin">Plugin</a> instances can be added to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/objectlinkinglayer">ObjectLinkingLayer</a> to receive callbacks when code is loaded or emitted, and when JITLink is being configured. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Plugins.push&#95;back(std::move(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Remove a plugin. This remove applies only to subsequent links (links</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// already underway will continue to use the plugin), and does not of itself</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// destroy the plugin -- destruction will happen once all shared pointers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// (including those held by in-progress links) are destroyed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a4bc37c4c8cfaf6346924ed90e7df38c4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a4bc37c4c8cfaf6346924ed90e7df38c4">removePlugin</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/plugin">Plugin</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::lock&#95;guard&lt;std::mutex&gt; Lock(LayerMutex);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">llvm::find&#95;if</a>(Plugins, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::shared&#95;ptr&lt;Plugin&gt; &amp;Elem) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elem.get() == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != Plugins.end() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Plugin not present&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Plugins.erase(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Emit a LinkGraph.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a4da9675d079c8aff4abac6c5ca2bc4c2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a4da9675d079c8aff4abac6c5ca2bc4c2">emit</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MaterializationResponsibility&gt; R,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Instructs this LinkgraphLinkingLayer instance to override the symbol flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// found in the LinkGraph with the flags supplied by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MaterializationResponsibility instance. This is a workaround to support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbol visibility in COFF, which does not use the libObject&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// SF&#95;Exported flag. Use only when generating / adding COFF object files.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FIXME: We should be able to remove this if/when COFF properly tracks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// exported symbols.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#ad724ca2d7c9b366f039bd13c3d04dcd3">LinkGraphLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a749aed4686716faf9e149640e2e4071d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a749aed4686716faf9e149640e2e4071d">setOverrideObjectFlagsWithResponsibilityFlags</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OverrideObjectFlags) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;OverrideObjectFlags = OverrideObjectFlags;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If set, this LinkGraphLinkingLayer instance will claim responsibility</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for any symbols provided by a given object file that were not already in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the MaterializationResponsibility instance. Setting this flag allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// higher-level program representations (e.g. LLVM IR) to be added based on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// only a subset of the symbols they provide, without having to write</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// intervening layers to scan and add the additional symbols. This trades</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// diagnostic quality for convenience however: If all symbols are enumerated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// up-front then clashes can be detected and reported early (and usually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// deterministically). If this option is set, clashes for the additional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbols may not be detected until late, and detection may depend on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the flow of control through JIT&#39;d code. Use with care.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer">LinkGraphLinkingLayer</a> &amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a42ee09093baf2b4dbb6fcabd6e869442"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/linkgraphlinkinglayer/#a42ee09093baf2b4dbb6fcabd6e869442">setAutoClaimResponsibilityForObjectSymbols</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AutoClaimObjectSymbols) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    this-&gt;AutoClaimObjectSymbols = AutoClaimObjectSymbols;</span></CodeLine>
